'Consumed' is a Canadian reality television series produced by Paperny
Entertainment that airs on HGTV Canada. The series stars de-cluttering expert
Jill Pollack, Vlessing, Etan. [http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/jill-pollack-host-lifestyle-tv-
49848 Jill Pollack to Host Lifestyle TV Series 'Consumed!'], "Hollywood
Reporter", November 29, 2010. Accessed June 21, 2012. who challenges
families overwhelmed by their possessions to survive for 30 days with only the
bare essentials. After the 30 days are over the families must decide which
possession they truly need and which to donate. The series, which films largely
in the Metro Vancouver area, Thomas, Sandra.
[http://www.vancourier.com/show+Consumed+with+much+stuff/5139671/story.html New
show âConsumedâ with too much stuff], "Vancouver Courier", July 21, 2011.
Accessed June 21, 2012. premiered on August 30, 2011.
